name: Jill Lublin
what_you_do: Jill Lublin is a master publicity strategist, consultant, speaker, and 4x bestselling author who empowers audiences through interactive keynotes, seminars, and training programs on publicity, networking, and influence marketing.
who_you_serve: Jill serves individuals and organizations looking to enhance their visibility and influence through effective publicity and networking strategies, including executives, sales teams, and marketing departments.
signature_programs: Get Noticed…Get Referrals, Networking Magic, Guerrilla Publicity, The Profit of Kindness
bio: 4x bestselling author, featured on stages with Tony Robbins and other notable figures, extensive media experience with ABC, NBC, CBS, and a large following of 20,682 on LinkedIn.
business_focus: Jill Lublin is a master publicity strategist, consultant, speaker, and 4x bestselling author who empowers audiences through interactive keynotes, seminars, and training programs on publicity, networking, and influence marketing.
